WhatIs.Title: What is Howdy?
WhatIs.Subtitle: The platform to improve communication in other languages with people from all over the world

HowDoes.Title: How does it work?
HowDoes.Step1: 1. Click on 'Sign Up' and create your account. Accessible from your favorite browser and any device.
HowDoes.Step2: 2. You will see people who speak the language you want to learn and who want to teach theirs while learning yours.
HowDoes.Step3: 3. You can choose from them based on your interests and request friendship.
HowDoes.Step4: 4. Complete your profile if you haven't already and upload posts. Just like in chats, they can correct you.
HowDoes.Step5: 5. At any time, choose whether to do exercises with AI. It will help you improve your writing and expand your vocabulary.
HowDoes.Step6: 6. Check out our blog and find useful guides for language learning.
